short_summary: Acquire an electric drive motor for the Azimuth thruster of the CCGS Captain Molly Kool
description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) wishes to acquire an electric drive motor for the Azimuth thruster of the CCGS Captain Molly Kool.
duration_in_months: Allotted duration is 10 months from May 31 to Mar 31, 2024.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: F6855-221403

## Notice Information

* **Notices Title**: F6855-221403 CCGS Captain Molly Kool - Azimuth Thruster Electrical Drive Motor
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-14
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-23T14:00:00
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Opportunity Overview

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) seeks to acquire an electric drive motor for the Azimuth thruster of the CCGS Captain Molly Kool. This procurement aims to acquire a reliable and efficient motor that meets the operational requirements of the vessel.

## Contract Requirements

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G and S)
* **UNSPSC Code**: 26101400 - Motor or generator components
* **Project Description**: Electric drive motor for Azimuth thruster of CCGS Captain Molly Kool
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-05-31
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

## Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Jonathan Grant
* **Contact Email**: [jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice URL

* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15999424?extsite=MTU5OTk0MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15999424?extsite=MTU5OTk0MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Notice Language**: English and French

## Attachments

None.

## Other Information

* **Cancellation Status**: This tender is cancelled and no proposals will be accepted.
